text: James Ronald "Jim" Ryun (born April 29, 1947) is an American politician and Olympic track and field athlete. He won a silver medal in the 1500 m at the 1968 Summer Olympics. Ryun later was in the United States House of Representatives from 1996 to 2007, representing Kansas' 2nd congressional district for the Republican Party. ==References== ==Other websites== *National Track & Field Hall of Fame entry *Kansas Sports Hall of Fame entry * * * * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Kansas Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Wichita, Kansas Category:Politicians from Wichita, Kansas Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Jim Ryun
